title: Mirror's Edge
description: Faye is a sixteen year old girl from a realm of joy, light, and peace. When a series of events draws her into a foreign land filled with violence, she is forced to face new emotions. Will Faye learn to accept these new found feelings and find her way home or will she remain trapped in the desolation of this strange land? Filled with twists and turns, this short story series will leave you on the edge of your seat, eager to know what happens next!
author: Corrie Fischer
